Package Entities

Class Entity

java.lang.Object
Entities.Entity
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Enemy, Player
public abstract class Entity extends Object implements Serializable
Since:
3/15/22
Version:
1.1 This class represents the base layer of an entity in the game. They can be damaged and can damage other entities.
Author:
Tony Teets
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Entity

      public Entity(String name, int health, int damage, int exp)
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the entity
      health - The health of the entity
      damage - The damage of the entity
      exp - The exp of the entity
      Since:
      3/15/22
      Precondition:
      name != "", health > 0, damage > 0, exp >= 0
      Postcondition:
      name != "" && getName() == name, health > 0 && getHealth() == health, damage > 0 && getDamage() == damage, exp >= 0 && getEXP() == exp

    • Entity

      public Entity(String name, int health, int damage)
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the entity
      health - The health of the entity
      damage - The damage of the entity
      Since:
      3/15/22
      Precondition:
      name != "", health > 0, damage > 0
      Postcondition:
      name != "" && getName() == name, health > 0 && getHealth() == health, damage > 0 && getDamage() == damage

  • Method Details

    • getName

      public String getName()

      Gets the name of the entity

      Returns:
      The name of the entity
      Since:
      3/15/22
      Precondition:
      name != ""
      Postcondition:
      name != "" && getName() == name

    • getHealth

      public int getHealth()

      Gets the health of the entity

      Returns:
      The health of the entity
      Since:
      3/15/22
      Precondition:
      health > 0
      Postcondition:
      health > 0 && getHealth() == health

    • getDamage

      public int getDamage()

      Gets the damage of the entity

      Returns:
      The damage of the entity
      Since:
      3/15/22
      Precondition:
      damage > 0
      Postcondition:
      damage > 0 && getDamage == damage

    • getExp

      public int getExp()

      Gets the exp of the entity

      Returns:
      The exp of the entity
      Since:
      3/15/22
      Precondition:
      exp >= 0
      Postcondition:
      exp >= 0 && getEXP() == exp

    • isDead

      public boolean isDead()

      Checks if the entity is dead or not by checking if the health is at 0.

      Returns:
      If the entity is dead or not
      Since:
      3/15/22
      Precondition:
      health >= 0
      Postcondition:
      (health == 0) ? true : false

    • damage

      public void damage(Entity other)

      Damages another entity by specifying who is being damaged.

      Parameters:
      other - the other entity that is being damaged
      Since:
      3/15/22
      Precondition:
      other.getHealth() > 0, damage > 0
      Postcondition:
      other.health -= this.damage

    • takeDamage

      protected void takeDamage(int damage)

      If the entity has enough health to take all the damage it will be removed. If it does not the health will be set to 0.

      Parameters:
      damage - the damage to be taken away from entity
      Since:
      3/15/22
      Precondition:
      damage > 0
      Postcondition:
      (damage > health) ? health = 0 : health -= damage

    • toString

      public abstract String toString()

      Common method for both Player and Enemy

      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      A string of the entity's information to be displayed
      Since:
      3/19/22
